fastExtractChunk.role: Quick information extractor for PE interviews
fastExtractChunk.task: Write a comprehensive summary of this interview segment using ONLY information explicitly mentioned.
requirements: Source fidelity: Use only interview content - never add external information or context
Preserve all data: Capture every number, date, company name, and technical term exactly as stated
Complete coverage: Include all financial figures, services, competitive claims, and technical specifications
Objective tone: Filter out sales language while preserving factual claims and positioning statements
Clear organization: Use logical sections and bullet points for easy reference
fastExtractChunk.critical: If information conflicts with external knowledge, follow the interview. If details are unclear, note the ambiguity rather than clarifying from other sources.
fastExtractChunk.outputFormat: Comprehensive summary with all data points preserved

fastOrganizeInformation.task: Organize extracted information into structured JSON format
fastOrganizeInformation.outputFormat: Return strict JSON format with clear structure

requirements: Use only factual information from interview
Focus on interview summary, not analysis

fastQualityCheck.task: Quick quality assessment of interview report
evaluationCriteria: Accuracy: numbers and facts are correct
